messages.title: Manor Ward Labour Team
messages.content: The Manor Ward Labour Team will campaign for: Improvements for the entrance to Woodbank Park, A new approach Road to existing Woodbank Car Park, and Increased Parking at the existing Woodbank car Park.

messages.title: PAUL MOSS CALLS FOR EQUAL LIBRARY OPENING HOURS FOR MANOR WARD RESIDENTS
messages.content: Paul Moss is calling on Stockport Council to 'open its libraries fully across the borough so all residents and children have the same facilities'.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Campaigning for improvements to the entrance to Woodbank Park, a new approach road, and increased parking at the existing Woodbank car park.
Advocating for equal library opening hours across all Manor Ward libraries.
Supporting equal pay, holidays, and sick pay and protection for part-time workers.

housing.content: Woodbank Park Car Park Scandal! Why has the listed base Manor Lib Dem Councillors signed a petition asking for a 76 space car park in Woodbank Park?

images.caption: Paul Moss pictured with 'LETS STAMP IT OUT' leaflet.
